pr_title: OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of several methods.

timeline.message:
OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
OslpUtils#isOslpResponse(OslpEnvelope).

OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
ConfigurationToOslpSetConfigurationRequestConverter#convert(ConfigurationDto,
Oslp.SetConfigurationRequest, MappingContext).

OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
OslpGetConfigurationResponseToConfigurationConverter#convert(Oslp.GetConfigurationResponse,
ConfigurationDto, MappingContext).

OC-615 ~ Resolves SonarQube issue 'Replace this if-then-else statement
by a single return statement'.

OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
Iec61850SetConfigurationCommand#setConfigurationOnDevice(Iec61850Client,
DeviceConnection, ConfigurationDto).

OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
IEC61850SetScheduleCommand#writeScheduleEntryForRelay(DeviceMessageLog,
 List<ScheduleEntry>, LogicalNode, NodeContainer schedule, int).

OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
Iec61850SetScheduleCommand#createScheduleEntries(List<ScheduleEntryDto>
, Ssld, RelayTypeDto, SsldDataService).
OC-615 ~ Reduces number of arguments to resolve SonarQube issue.

timeline.bodyText: Reduce this anonymous class number of lines from 164 to at most 20, or make it a named class.
timeline.author: jenkins-ip-10-4-24-184

timeline.bodyText:
I think this should be a private method.
Furthermore, the parameter could be an int, nothing is done with the Configuration object in this method besides using the getLongTermHistoryInterval.
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Changed method to private and added arguments for the interval value and type.
replies.author: kevinsmeets

timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: I added the test to the unit tests and refactored the method.
replies.author: kevinsmeets

timeline.bodyText: I think the readability would be improved if the order of private methods is the same as the calling order setRelayConfiguration, setOsgpIpAddressAndPort, setAstronomicalOffsets, setClockConfiguration and setDhcpConfiguration
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Method order changed to calling order.
replies.author: kevinsmeets

timeline.bodyText: nice way to get rid of the ssldDataService parameter in lots of methods!
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: It would improve readability if the order of private methods would be the same as the calling order.
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Method order changed to calling order.

timeline.bodyText: It would improve readability if the order of private methods would be the same as the calling order.

robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: according to https://github.com/SmartSocietyServices/Way-of-Working-Wiki/wiki/Suppression-of-SonarQube-warnings-like-FalsePositives a justification why the specific warning is being suppressed should be given
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.message:
OC-615 ~ Reduces cyclomatic complexity of
OslpDeviceService#handleOslpResponseGetStatus(DeviceRequest,
OslpEnvelope, DeviceResponseHandler).
